name: @ln-maf/preprocessor
description: This project will preprocess feature files to allow more input variables to be supplied.  This can be supplied through javascript, a csv/psv/json array file or a mixture of these.  This will hopefully allow it to be easier to maintain larger test sets.

scripts.cucumber:exec:coverage: npx nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --report-dir=../../coverage npx cucumber-js -f json:../../test/report/preprocessor.json --require "stepDefinitions/*.js" tmp/features/*.feature
scripts.test: npm run preprocess && npm run cucumber:exec && npm run test:finalize
scripts.test:coverage: npm run preprocess && npm run cucumber:exec:coverage && npm run test:finalize
